title: CSS Collection
description: A collection of components that showcases what can be done with CSS, from the simple to the more complex I aim to show how with a little extra CSS you can elevate your site.

title: Dictionary Dynamo
description: A dictionary site that is a hub of words with a word of the day generated & a set of flashcards based on school subjects. Using two APIs, I aimed to make the classic dictionary site with a fun twist.

title: Advice Generator
description: Original concept based on an assignment on Frontend Mentor. I added many features on top of the original concept (roll counter, like section, like, delete & clear buttons).
